str2: Or heneken hen'-ek-en or heineken hi'-nek-en; of uncertain affinity; on account of.
Jewish. From Iouda; Judaean, i.e. Belonging to Jehudah.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Middle - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: From sun and lambano; to clasp, i.e. Seize; specially, to conceive; by implication, to aid.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Neuter of hieros; a sacred place, i.e. The entire precincts of the Temple.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: Mid: I try, attempt, endeavor. From peira; to test, i.e. to attempt.
From dia and a derivative of cheir; to handle thoroughly, i.e. Lay violent hands upon.
